home_develop.title: Welcome to EnglishUp
home_develop.subtitle: Learn English in a simple and direct way.
home_develop.description: An app focused on practicing English, especially the structure and grammar as are the verbs, formulas and phrases with key tools, without unnecessary things. Simple, direct and functional.

theme.title: üé® Dynamic theme
theme.description: Change the app theme between light and dark.

language.title: üåê Language change
language.description: Change the app language between Spanish and English.

verbs_section.title: üìö Verbs sections
verbs_section.description: Explore and study the most common English verbs with clear explanations and practical examples.

verbs_game.title: üéÆ Verb practice game
verbs_game.description: Practice your English verbs with an interactive game that tests your knowledge of verbs in different contexts.

edain.name: Edain Jesus Cortez Ceron
edain.role: Full Stack Developer and creator of this app
edain.description: Software engineer with experience in full-stack development, project management, and the creation of secure and scalable technological solutions. Specialized in robust applications, process optimization, and software architecture.

items.title: App repository
items.description: App repository in GitHub, where you can find the source code of the app.

items.title: Verb List
items.description: Repository of the app in GitHub, where you can find the source code and learn more about the app.

keys_verb.description_simple_form: The simple form is the way in which the verb is written in the present simple.
keys_verb.description_past_participle: The past participle is the way in which the verb is written in the past simple.
keys_verb.description_gerund: The gerund is the way in which the verb is written in the gerund.
keys_verb.description_meaning: The meaning is the definition of the verb.
keys_verb.description_third_person: The third person is the way in which the verb is written in the third person.
keys_verb.description_simple_past: The simple past is the way in which the verb is written in the simple past.

keys.win_description: Your IQ is higher than the average!

game_1.title: Questions and answers
game_1.description: Choose which type of question you want to answer (for example, the meaning or the past of a verb) and select the correct option from the available answers.

modal.title: Select an option
modal.error_same: The question and answer cannot be the same.

game_2.title: Verb memory
game_2.description: Find the pairs of verbs relating their form and meaning.
